messages.subject: boy scout trouble & how to do it all
messages.msgSnippet: ... --=-He got stuck in a tent alone, (2 cots per tent and an odd number of  boys) -=- They should ve put three in one tent.   That s just hateful bad
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>Abuse

--=-He got stuck in a tent alone, (2 cots per tent and
an odd number of boys) -=-

They should've put three in one tent. That's just
hateful bad
planning.

If that were my kid, I would make a glorious
counter-offer and not
encourage
him to go at ALL.

Crap like that will stick with a person for life.
You're not
protecting him
right now if you send him back and it's not just a
passing thing.

Sandra>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Amen, sister!!! crap like that stuck with ME for life.
that's why I pulled my son away from it as soon as I
regained consciousness. my credentials: i was teased &
bullied as a child, i am a mom, i have a son, he was
bullied, i removed him from the situation, and it was
the smartest thing I ever did.

also: re: marriage: I am a single parent, and if I
could do ONE thing over again in life, I would go back
to the point of the break up and try a few more things
I didn't try at the time, because having separated
parents is hell for kids.
Anna
